conversation_message.subject: Disputed Transaction Inquiry
conversation_message.body: I've noticed a transaction on my account that I don't recognize. It's for $200 on January 25th, 2024. I did not authorize this payment and need assistance resolving this issue.

parts.body: Thank you for bringing this to our attention. We are reviewing the transaction details and will get back to you within the next 24 hours to resolve the issue.
